name: SpoilerCountryGeekCultureNewsBrief
0:
”Alexa, what's my Flash Briefing?”
”Alexa, play my Flash Briefing”
skdetail:
Flash Briefing Skill
This skill contains: dynamic content.
Developer Terms of Use
des:
Spoiler Country is John and Kenric talking about comic book and all things nerdy. 

Join us for new episodes weekly and use this skill to get flash briefing updates on all our new releases!

We currently have our main podcast, Spoiler Country in which we talk comics, movies, conventions, and talk to creators!

Drinks and Comics on YouTube where we make drinks we like and talk about something in the geek space. 

Kickstarter/Podcast Signal Boost podcast where we highlight awesome kickstarters and podcasts. 

And so much more!
